name: Pumped BMX Pro
description: Pumped BMX Pro is the next installment in the high adrenaline, fast-paced arcade BMX trickathon. Master 60 levels and over 200 challenges while pulling off as many radical stunts as possible on one of 15 bikes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 x64 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4500 (2 * 2200) or equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 9600 GT (512 MB) Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 x64 Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 (2 * 3400) or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 (1024 MB) Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
